title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 820.2 - Time for filing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 820.2 - Time for filing

State Regulations

All persons required to report the owning, possessing or
harboring of a wild animal shall file such report with the city, town or
village clerk within whose jurisdiction the animal is owned, possessed or
harbored, on or before April 1st of each year. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19

820.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
